Text.Page:
Thulsa's at it again! The beasts in Frostclaw Crag turned on our forces and hit them hard. That means there's another damned pylon out there.

Link up with Ghabar and take your lead from him, but I want that pylon destroyed!

Thenuvia's right. These draelkar pylons aren't hard to spot, but they're not easy to get to.

This one's guarded by Sihranar remnants. I don't know what possessed them to side with Thulsa, but with the right plan, it won't matter.

Let me get my thinking horns on and let's plan our mission.
